ThingDef.label: tomato
ThingDef.description: Contrary to popular belief, these are neither a vegetable or a fruit. They are cysts that grow on the back of a tomato frog.

ThingDef.label: spring peeper egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized peeper egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: spring peeper egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized peeper egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a spring peeper. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
